title: (x) Cuban - Cuba {Stephen}
content:
Hi all -- anyone know what this is?   
   
 ![cuban.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001346im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3151.jpg)
author: cheshiredave

comments.content:
Wow. Two [Medina queries](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001346/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3044.html) within a month. He's hot!   
This one is Cuba.
That was badass, Stephen, simply badass. Thanks very much.
Agreed, Dave. Maybe you hadn't heard -- Stephen is required by law, each year, to get the Font Identification part of his brain registered with the proper federal authorities.
